response.overview: In a small town in southern Brazil, six LGBTQIAP+ youths gather in a basement and come up with a bold idea: to hold the first local Pride Parade. Amid laughter, painful memories, and dreams of change, the group confronts fears, prejudices, and the desire to belong. Campo Pequeno is a sensitive and necessary portrait of youth, friendship, and the strength to exist out loud.
response.title: Campo Pequeno
